features.title: New Allocation System
features.desc: Now you can pay less for more! Whenever you pay for a tier you can allocate resources freely between your profiles

features.title: No More Charges per Profile
features.desc: You no longer have to worry about Profile costs! Each plan has a fixed amount of built-in Profile seats.

features.title: Downgrade it yourself
features.desc: Now you have the ability to downgrade your profile's resources without opening a ticket!
